CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS alarms(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, hour INTEGER DEFAULT 8, minute INTEGER DEFAULT 30, sunday INTEGER DEFAULT 0, monday INTEGER DEFAULT 1, tuesday INTEGER DEFAULT 1, wednesday INTEGER DEFAULT 1, thursday INTEGER DEFAULT 1, friday INTEGER DEFAULT 1, saturday INTEGER DEFAULT 0, content_uri TEXT);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS notes(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, note TEXT, timestamp INTEGER);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tips(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT, description TEXT, url TEXT);
ALTER TABLE alarms ADD COLUMN enabled INTEGER DEFAULT 1;
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS checklist_items(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, category TEXT, enabled INTEGER DEFAULT 1);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS checklist_events(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, item_id INTEGER, timestamp INTEGER);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sleep_diaries(_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, did_nap INTEGER DEFAULT 0, woke_earlier INTEGER DEFAULT 0, bed_hour INTEGER DEFAULT 12, bed_minute INTEGER DEFAULT 0, sleep_hour INTEGER DEFAULT 12, sleep_minute INTEGER DEFAULT 0, wake_hour INTEGER DEFAULT 12, wake_minute INTEGER DEFAULT 0, up_hour INTEGER DEFAULT 12, up_minute INTEGER DEFAULT 0, sleep_delay INTEGER DEFAULT 0,wake_count INTEGER DEFAULT 0, sleep_quality INTEGER DEFAULT 0, timestamp INTEGER);
ALTER TABLE sleep_diaries ADD COLUMN comments TEXT;
